dashboard.title: Organizer Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your events and sales performance
dashboard.no_events: No events found. Start by creating your first event!

fields.unique_qr_hint: When enabled, each ticket issues a unique QR code. When disabled, one QR code is issued for the entire group (Bulk Registration).
fields.onsite_quota_hint: When enabled, you can reserve a portion of ticket stock for on-site (box office) sales. Online sales will stop once the quota is reached.
fields.quota_defaults_hint: These values will be applied as defaults to new tickets. You can still override them per ticket.
fields.all_day_hint: Enable if this event lasts the entire day (no specific start or end time).
fields.single_day_hint: Turn off if this event continues for multiple days.
fields.show_end_time_hint: When enabled, the event end time will be displayed on customer-facing pages.
fields.date_format_hint: Choose how dates will be displayed on customer-facing pages
fields.enable_shop_hint: Displays a merchandise section on the event page so attendees can buy goods with their tickets.
fields.disable_delivery_hint: When enabled, only pickup option will be available during checkout and delivery will be disabled.
fields.abandoned_cart_hint: When enabled, automated reminder emails will be sent to users who abandon their cart (expired temp registrations). Emails are sent via cron job every 6-12 hours.
fields.payment_methods_desc: Select the payment gateways you want to enable for this event.
fields.payment_warning: You must select at least one payment method for paid tickets.
fields.stripe: Stripe (Credit/Debit Cards, Google Pay, Apple Pay)

fields.name: Event Name
fields.slug_hint: Custom URL for your event (e.g., 'event-name-2024'). Leave empty to auto-generate from event name.

counters.subtitle: Manage physical points of sale for your organization
